beginner.title: Beginner Writing
beginner.description: Simple sentences and basic paragraph writing

lessons.title: Write About Yourself
lessons.prompt: Write a short paragraph (50-80 words) about yourself. Include your name, age, hobbies, and family.

lessons.title: Describe Your Day
lessons.prompt: Write about what you did yesterday. Use past tense verbs and time expressions.

lessons.title: Opinion Essay
lessons.prompt: Write an essay (150-200 words) about whether students should wear uniforms to school. Give your opinion and support it with reasons.
instructions: Start with a clear thesis statement
Use examples to support your points
Write a conclusion that restates your opinion

lessons.title: Argumentative Essay
lessons.prompt: Write a formal argumentative essay (300-400 words) on the topic: 'Should artificial intelligence replace human teachers in education?' Present both sides of the argument and give your reasoned conclusion.
instructions: Write a compelling introduction with a clear thesis
Write a strong conclusion with your final position
